00046 // Grid values 
00047 #define VOLTAGE_SENSE 0x1000
00048 #define I_CONSTANT 0x2000
00049 #define LLA_IN 0x4000
00050 #define LLA_OUT 0x8000
00051 
00052 // ueac modes
00053 #define UEAC_HALT 0x01
00054 #define UEAC_RUN 0x02
00055 
00056 // ueac_instruction commands 
00057 #define UEAC_READY  0x00 
00058 #define UEAC_EXECUTE 0x01
00059 
00060 // ueac_instruction commands 
00061 #define UEAC_ALL_V 0
00062 #define UEAC_ALL_I 1 
00063 #define UEAC_READ_V 2
00064 #define UEAC_READ_I 3
00065 #define UEAC_WRITE 4
00066 #define UEAC_LLA_ADD 5
00067 #define UEAC_LLA_DISABLE 6
00068 #define UEAC_LLA_ENABLE 7
00069 #define UEAC_LLA_REPORT 8
00070 #define UEAC_RST 9
00071 #define UEAC_CAL 10
00072 #define UEAC_LON 11
00073 #define UEAC_LOF 12
00074 
00075 typedef struct ueac_instruction {
00076   unsigned char command_reg;           // command that starts the instruction processing
00077   unsigned char instruction_type;      // tells command execution phase which instruction to execute
00078   unsigned char lla_descriptor;        // indicates the particular lla to use  
00079   unsigned char pin_x;                 // X,Y location of the probe site to be used, LLA input pins
00080   unsigned char pin_y;
00081   unsigned char pin_x_alt;             // X,Y location of the probe site to be used, LLA output pins
00082   unsigned char pin_y_alt;
00083   int value;                           // value to be applied when in write mode.
00084   unsigned char lla_function;    
00085   unsigned char lla_period;
00086 } ueac_instruction_t;
00087 
00088 typedef struct lla {
00089   unsigned char enable;                // 0=lla disabled, 1=lla enabled, 0xFF unitialized. 
00090   unsigned char in_pin;                // 0 to 24 
00091   unsigned char out_pin;               // 0 to 24 + 0xFF (if all FF then no sheet output). 
00092   unsigned int *function_ptr;          // pointer to the base of the lla lookup table
00093   unsigned char period;                // write 1-255 
00094   unsigned char counter;
00095   int in_val;
00096   int out_val;
00097   long accumulator; 
00098 } lla_t;
00099 
00100 typedef struct cal {
00101   char i_200uA_offset;
00102   char i_zero_offset;
00103   char i_in_floor;
00104   char i_in_offset;
00105 } cal_t;
00106 
00107 typedef struct ueac {
00108   ueac_instruction_t instruction;      // request to modify the state of the system
00109   unsigned long lla_input;             // bit packed long where a 1 indicates that is an lla input. 
00110   unsigned short pin_current[25];      // current flowing to/from a particular pin driver. 
00111   cal_t pin_cal[25];
00112   lla_t lla_table[10];                 // structure to track the lla pin relationships
00113 } ueac_t;  
00114 
00115 // Function Prototypes 
00116 extern int init_ueac(ueac_t *);
00117 extern int display_ueac(ueac_t *);
00118 extern int ueac_execute_instruction(ueac_t *);
00119 extern int lla_input_check(char,ueac_t *);
